Header.title: Welcome, I am Phebe Yawson
Header.paragraph: Author of She Cried Wolf, a mother, chef, homeschooler, and poet.

About.paragraph: In 2002, Phebe Yawson volunteered her services to a non-profit in Ghana, West Africa after graduating from DeVry. In 2015, she relocated back to America to raise her family. Now able to pursue her dreams, she spends her days with her husband and kids and her nights with her pen. Phebe is now an award winning author and poet.

Testimonials.text: "I had no idea what I would find insie She Cried Wolf. I was thrilled to discover everything I enjoy about a good YA fantasy story. This tales has it all- characters with real emotions, a believable heroine, and an imaginative plot that left me crying for more. Phage Yawson is a very promising new author and I expect many more thrilling stories from her."
Testimonials.name: Terri

Testimonials.text: "She Cried Wolf is an amazing read of good vs. evil! It’s so much more than a shape-shifter story. There are twists and turns throughout! Tyese learns of who she is and what she’s capable of and you find yourself cheering her on!! There are so many great lines in this book! I don’t want to give any spoilers so I’ll share the one line that not only gives Tyese hope, but as you read it, it gives you hope. “You have everything you need within you.” I can NOT recommend this book enough. I can NOT wait for the second book."
Testimonials.name: Dizzy

Testimonials.text: "This novella was a mix of fantasy and coming-of-age. Tyese is graduating from high school and finding out who she is in a tremendous, extraordinary way (I won't say more, as I don't want to give away any spoilers). She also learns of some rather important and life-altering secrets her family has kept from her. This novella is fast - paced(at time whip - lash fast), YA fantasy full of surprises and twists.A great story for teens and adults who love strong characters with a huge dose of fantasy!"
Testimonials.name: Jim Kanso

Testimonials.text: "The writer of this book is so talented. This story was so intriguing and exciting to read. I look forward to seeing what else she has to offer as an author."
Testimonials.name: ReeRee

Testimonials.text: "A true page turner! A strong heroine with superhero powers that is pulled into a supernatural plot to destroy earths balance had me on the edge for the whole book. I cannot wait to read what happens next, Yawson really knows how to keep me guessing!"
Testimonials.name: Carlos E. Turnbull Jr

Testimonials.text: "I really loved the book .. seeing tyese grow into a beautiful confident warrior was great. The storyline was intriguing I couldn't put it down. Very inspiring and funny!!! I believe this could be a movie."
Testimonials.name: BookLover
